solution_line_template: In coach Tim's team, {players_no_caution} out of {total_players} players did not receive any caution, so {total_players} - {players_no_caution} = <<{total_players}-{players_no_caution}={cautioned_players}>>{cautioned_players} players were cautioned.

Each cautioned player received a yellow card, so all the cautioned players received {cautioned_players} * {yellow_cards_per_cautioned_player} =<<{cautioned_players}*{yellow_cards_per_cautioned_player}={total_yellow_cards}>>{total_yellow_cards} yellow cards.

Knowing that each red card corresponds to {yellow_cards_per_red_card} yellow cards, the team would have {total_yellow_cards} / {yellow_cards_per_red_card} = <<{total_yellow_cards}/{yellow_cards_per_red_card}={total_red_cards}>>{total_red_cards} red cards.
